Package showtimepackage

Class Showtime

java.lang.Object
showtimepackage.Showtime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IBooking
public class Showtime extends Object implements IBooking, Serializable
Showtime class that stores a showtime instance
Since:
06-11-2022
Author:
Ng Tze Kean
